home.title: Welcome to CIM Toolkit
home.subtitle: Professional coordinate system conversion tool providing accurate and efficient coordinate conversion services
home.description: Supports conversion between multiple coordinate systems, including WGS84, GCJ02, BD09, CGCS2000 and other common coordinate systems to meet coordinate conversion needs in different scenarios.

accuracy.title: High Precision
accuracy.description: Using professional algorithms to ensure the accuracy and reliability of coordinate conversion

speed.title: Fast Processing
speed.description: Efficient computing engine supporting single point and batch coordinate conversion

multiple.title: Multiple Systems
multiple.description: Supporting WGS84, GCJ02, BD09, CGCS2000 and other coordinate systems

userFriendly.title: User Friendly
userFriendly.description: Simple and intuitive interface to reduce the threshold of use

singleTransform.title: Single Point Transform
singleTransform.description: Support single point coordinate conversion between multiple coordinate systems

batchTransform.title: Batch Transform
batchTransform.description: Support batch coordinate conversion to improve work efficiency

mapVisualization.title: Map Visualization
mapVisualization.description: Visually display conversion results and location information on the map

epsgSupport.title: EPSG Support
epsgSupport.description: Support standard EPSG coordinate system codes to meet professional needs

single.title: Single Point Coordinate Transform
single.description: Support single point coordinate conversion between multiple coordinate systems, including WGS84, GCJ02, BD09, CGCS2000 and other common coordinate systems

batch.title: Batch Coordinate Transform
batch.description: Support batch coordinate conversion to improve work efficiency

wgs84.name: WGS84 Coordinate System
wgs84.description: World Geodetic System, coordinate system used by GPS

gcj02.name: GCJ02 Coordinate System
gcj02.description: Mars coordinate system used by AutoNavi and Tencent Maps

bd09.name: BD09 Coordinate System
bd09.description: Baidu coordinate system used by Baidu Maps

cgcs2000.name: CGCS2000 Coordinate System
cgcs2000.description: China Geodetic Coordinate System 2000, China's official coordinate system
